title: Building Secure Messaging and AI Infrastructure at an Early-Stage Startup
description: An in-depth look at Arkavoâ€™s secure real-time messaging platform and AI infrastructure, including architecture, encryption methods, and DevOps practices for scalability and security.

speaker_bio: Paul Flynn is the Founder of Arkavo, a startup focused on building a privacy-first social network. With experience in software development and DevOps, Paul has contributed to projects like OpenTDF and specializes in privacy-enhancing technologies.
